text: O, Tiofirus, gu mba fharav khergi gap, gu ana kherav, gu mba Zisas fhara guarara won ŋaara bakɨme khavgiap, mba gumgi gu mbigi ana Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe khɨvav mbe suaŋgi bigi gu za nta neŋgegi. 1.1 Ruk kha gava khergi. Mba gava zɨ khare. Zisas farasegi 12 thɨgi ŋaara gumgi muuŋgi ŋaari. Ruk khaŋ nzuai, ana fhara guarara, ana kha gava khergi. Mba gava zɨ khare, Ruk khergi kaman vhuuŋ.
